text: Harry Styles took to Friday morning to announce the dates for his first solo world tour, Harry Styles Live On Tour. It will begin Sept. 19 in the United States and end in Japan in early December. All tickets go on sale on Friday, May 5 ( excluding Japan ) via local ticketing agents. Those sales begin just a week ahead of the debut of Styles ’ self - titled debut album, which will be released May 12. Fan registration for all North American dates has commenced, though supplies are limited. To prevent other vendors from re - selling tickets at higher prices, concert - goers can sign up for Ticketmaster ’ s Verified Fan program.
